question: What is the final diagnosis?

I have a non-healing growth on my right cheek that started bleeding easily after I accidentally bumped into it.
Has the size, shape, or color of the growth changed over time?
I haven't noticed any changes in the size, shape, or color of the growth.

I have had the growth on my cheek for about one year.
Do you have any personal or family history of skin cancer?
I haven't mentioned anything about personal or family history of skin cancer.

No, I haven't experienced any other symptoms like weight loss, fever, or night sweats.

I didn't mention the texture or the surface details of the growth in what I shared.
Final Diagnosis: Basal Cell Carcinoma
